channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023100887
item.description:
Report X-2023100887

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package containing flammable/corrosive liquid arrived at sort facility. Package was placed in plastic bags and drum and held for QA inspection. One metal drum with a loose top was packed into a box too large for the item, with only a few styrofoam peanuts inside to protect the contents. DescribePack: 1 loose top DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in plastic bags and drum and held for QA inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023100666
item.description:
Report X-2023100666

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking drum of ethanol arrived at station with cellophane wrapped around the bottom. Further investigation found that the cellophane was covering up a small puncture hole near the bottom of the drum. The package was placed in a plastic bin and taken to QA for inspection when it arrived at the terminal. DescribePack: 1 small puncture hole near the bottom of the drum. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bag/bin and taken to QA for inspection when damage was discovered.

item.title: Report X-2023100736
item.description:
Report X-2023100736

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-13T18:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-09
  • City: YPSILANTI
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RMP NOTICED A WET HAZMAT PACKAGE. EMPLOYEES WERE INSTRUCTED TO NOT TOUCH THE PACAKAGE AND TO LEAVE THE AREA AROUND THE PACKAGE. RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED. RESPONDER APPROACHES IN FULL PPE WITH DT IN HAND. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE APROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE IS THEN SAFELY TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
